# Fermat RSA (50 Points)
Decrypt C and you will get the flag
# Solved
Selesai menggunakan script python
```python
from Crypto.Util.number import *
import math
import gmpy2

c = 
e = 65537
n = 

# From Documentation
N = gmpy2.mpz(n)
gmpy2.get_context().precision = 2048
a = int(gmpy2.sqrt(N))
a2 = a * a
b2 = gmpy2.sub(a2, N)
while not (gmpy2.is_square(b2)):
    a = a + 1
    b2 = a * a - N
b2 = gmpy2.mpz(b2)
gmpy2.get_context().precision = 2048
b = int(gmpy2.sqrt(b2))

p = a + b
q = a - b
# ===================================

phi = (p - 1) * (q - 1)
d = inverse(e, phi)

r = pow(c, d, n)

print(bytearray.fromhex(str(hex(r))[2:-1]).decode())
```
Flag : <b>PlaygroundCTF{f3rm4t_f4ct0r}</b>
